alert.note: Alert for Benton; Buchanan; Cedar; Delaware; Dubuque; Iowa; Johnson; Jones; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 10 at 2:13PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Buchanan, northwestern Cedar, northwestern Dubuque, northern Johnson, southeastern Benton, western Jones, Delaware, Linn and northeastern Iowa Counties through 300 PM CST... At 213 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Lamont to near Conroy. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Lamont and Dundee around 220 PM CST. Other locations in the path of these storms include Edgewood, Greeley, Cedar Rapids, Fairfax, Swisher, Shueyville, Ely, Colesburg, Lake Macbride State Park, Solon, Mount Vernon, Lisbon and Bertram. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Iowa between mile markers 217 and 218. Interstate 380 between mile markers 6 and 40. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Benton; Buchanan; Cedar; Delaware; Dubuque; Iowa; Johnson; Jones; Linn
